io.gearpump.jarstore

Class FileDirective

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.gearpump.jarstore.FileDirective

  • public class FileDirective
extends java.lang.Object
    FileDirective is a set of Akka-http directive to upload/download huge binary files to/from Akka-Http server.

    • Nested Class Summary

      File information after a file is uploaded to server.
